mainHero.title: Welcome to Jsecurity
mainHero.subtitle: Your Ultimate Android Security Solution! üõ°Ô∏è
mainHero.description: Keep your Android device safe and secure with Jsecurity, the all-in-one security app designed to protect your device and your data. With a comprehensive range of features, Jsecurity offers peace of mind in an increasingly digital world.

items.title: Never worry about losing your device again. üìç
items.description: Never worry about losing your device again. With Jsecurity's Live Device Location feature, you can track your Android device in real-time. Whether it's misplaced at home or left behind in a public place, you'll always know its exact whereabouts, providing you with peace of mind and ensuring that you can retrieve it quickly and efficiently.

items.title: Device Lock & Anti-Theft!
items.description: Protect your device from unauthorized access with Jsecurity's Device Lock & Anti-Theft feature. Our robust locking system ensures that only you can access your device, even in the event of theft or loss. With anti-theft measures in place, including remote locking capabilities, you can rest assured that your data remains safe and secure, no matter what.!

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.
